title: Covid-19 Clinic Protocols & Questions
description: Thanks for your cooperation with our new clinic procedures. We are continually updating our procedures & doing our best to keep our patients and ourselves safe.
cleaned_text: Covid-19 Clinic Protocols & Questions Masks are optional at Center for Chiropractic + Wellness and in ALL healthcare settings in Oregon starting April 3, 2023. If you have any symptoms that are related to COVID-19, we ask that you please stay home and reschedule your appointment.
